q_text: Would you like to be able to skip doses when escalating?
Would you like to be able to skip doses when de-escalating?
Do you want to prevent escalation of doses if the overall observed DLT rate at the current dose level is above the target DLT rate?
What is the estimate of the prior variance?
What is the minimum number of patients required at recommended dose before early stopping?
What are the prior estimates of the DLT rates at each dose? Please separate each value with a comma, ie 0.1, 0.12, 0.22, 0.5 for 4 doses.
What are the true DLT rates at each dose for this scenario? Please separate each value with a comma, ie 0.05, 0.15, 0.3, 0.7 for 4 doses.
What is your prior guess of the MTD
How many simulations would you like to run?
